Just wanted to tell you something about Pxnda | For Life
#1363

He is executive and staff on a lot of hosts, he is toxic little 10 year old
He demotes people for no reason, beggs people for staff so they give him admin perms and he sets up his role to be executive, he is unprofesional and doesnt know none about hosting, he even doesnt know how to use staff panel or add resources he only knows how to setup like discord and he cant even do that lmfao.
He is a really toxic kid and so unprofesional, he says words like nigga and swears at people.
In tickets he acts like shit closes tickets argues a lot and all other stuf, he even deleted one guy server on staff panel on accident beacuse he is stupid.
He is good friend with Oreo#1515 and rusjs#0001 so they always give him role on all hosts
He was staff on many failure hosts and hes been acting like piece of shit.
Example: Raided,Affinity Soon Night Nodes and many more i dont remeber names cuz he banned me.

So please if you have host and you owner just demote this kid or he will ruin your host to!!!
Pxnda | For Life#1363

Also lets get him of discord because you need to be 13+ to be on discord!!
So everyone report him now Pxnda | For Life#1363
FuckPxndaForLifee Dude grow up alright? Put this behind you and look into the future instead. Honestly are you fucking 5 years old now or are you "mature for your age"?
